label: 善見城
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Also Joyful-to-See Palace (kikenjō). In Buddhism, the great residential complex of the god Indra (J. Taishakuten) in the heaven of the 33 divinities. Its main building is the magnificent Shūshō Hall. [喜見城, 帝釈天, ]
